National Gallery of Art, Washington, DC

The National Gallery of Art in Washington, DC, has a fascinating collection of artworks. Who cannot stand in awe every time s/he faces these wonders? People appreciate art as an experience that challenges the understanding of the world. Yet, although the appreciation may differ depending on individuals, communities, and cultures, all humans share in common the transcending experience.

Thank you for visiting my photo gallery. [Click here to return to the previous page]
